mapper.insert: insert into customer_info (CUI_NUM, CUI_ID, CUI_PWD, CUI_BIRTH, CUI_EMAIL, CUI_PHONE, CUI_TRANS, CUI_GRADE, CUI_CREDAT, CUI_CRETIM, CUI_MODDAT, CUI_MODTIM ) values (@COUNT+1, #{cuiId}, #{cuiPwd}, #{cuiBirth}, #{cuiEmail}, #{cuiPhone}, #{cuiTrans}, #{cuiGrade}, #{cuiCredat}, #{cuiCretim}, #{cuiModdat}, #{cuiModtim} )
